title: Potato gnocchi, grilled radicchio and sausage sauce
description: Leftover baked potatoes are perfect for this easy gnocchi recipe, served with a rich sausage sauce and bitter leaves.
ingredients: 50g/2oz parmesan, finely grated, plus extra for serving
4 pork sausages, skins removed, or 200g minced pork belly
small bunch flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
